text: Yurizan Beltrán Lebanue (November 2, 1986 – December 13, 2017), known as Yurizan Beltran, was an American pornographic actress. She was born in Los Angeles on November 2, 1986 of Mexican descent. Her mother was Brazilian and her father was Canadian. Beltran was nominated for a total of six AVN Awards. Her career began in 2005. Beltran died on December 13, 2017 in Los Angeles from a suspected drug overdose at the age of 31. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American pornographic actors Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States
title: Yurizan Beltran
